title: President Donald J. Trump Is Combating Violence and Protecting America’s Monuments, Memorials, and Statues – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 26, 2020
They’re tearing down statues, desecrating monuments, and purging dissenters. It’s not the behavior of a peaceful political movement; it’s the behavior of totalitarians and tyrants and people that don’t love our country.

						Donald J. Trump							
President of the United StatesDEFENDING OUR SHARED HISTORY: President Donald J. Trump is taking action to defend our Nation’s historical monuments, statues, and memorials.
